statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_materials_inventory;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM packaging_materials_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM packaging_materials_inventory ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM packaging_materials_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM packaging_materials_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT material_name, location FROM packaging_materials_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials_inventory WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM packaging_materials_inventory WHERE location LIKE 'Warehouse%';
SELECT material_name, quantity, location FROM packaging_materials_inventory WHERE material_name LIKE '%box%' ORDER BY quantity DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT order_id, quantity_needed, order_date FROM production_orders WHERE due_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_level
SELECT pm.material_name, po.order_date, po.due_date FROM packaging_materials pm JOIN production_orders po ON pm.material_id = po.material_id
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_id, quantity_in_stock, reorder_level FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity_in_stock > reorder_level
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT order_id, quantity_ordered, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE delivery_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_threshold FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity_in_stock FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, packaging_materials.material_name, orders.quantity_ordered, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN packaging_materials ON orders.material_id = packaging_materials.material_id;
SELECT stockout_id, material_id, stockout_date, resolved_date, stockout_reason FROM stockouts WHERE resolved_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock, unit_price FROM packaging_materials
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT * FROM stock_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC

SELECT supplier_name, material_name, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM suppliers s JOIN purchase_orders po ON s.supplier_id = po.supplier_id JOIN packaging_materials pm ON po.material_id = pm.material_id
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_level
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM packaging_materials WHERE unit_price > 50.00 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_level FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_level ORDER BY quantity_in_stock ASC

SELECT p.order_id, s.supplier_name, pm.material_name, po.quantity_ordered, po.order_date FROM purchase_orders po JOIN suppliers s ON po.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN packaging_materials pm ON po.material_id = pm.material_id WHERE po.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY po.order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity, unit_of_measurement FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT material_id, current_stock, critical_threshold FROM stock_level WHERE current_stock < critical_threshold;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT material_name, quantity, unit_of_measurement FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT s.supplier_name, p.purchase_date, m.material_name, p.quantity FROM suppliers s JOIN purchases p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN packaging_materials m ON m.id = p.material_id;
SELECT p.order_id, m.material_name, o.order_date, o.expected_completion_date FROM production_orders o JOIN packaging_materials m ON o.material_id = m.id JOIN purchases p ON p.material_id = m.id;
